meals.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
meals.instructions: Cook pasta, prepare sauce, combine and serve.

meals.name: Chicken Curry
meals.instructions: Cook chicken, add curry paste, pour coconut milk, simmer, serve with rice.

meals.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
meals.instructions: Stir fry vegetables, add sauce, mix with noodles.

meals.name: Beef Tacos
meals.instructions: Cook beef, fill taco shells, top with veggies and cheese.

meals.name: Pancakes
meals.instructions: Mix ingredients, pour on hot pan, flip, serve with syrup.
